title: Colonel Lotfi Stadium
text:
Colonel Lotfi Stadium () is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Tlemcen">Tlemcen</a>, <a href="Algeria">Algeria</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="WA%20Tlemcen">WA Tlemcen</a>. The stadium holds 18,000 people.
Algeria national football team matches.
The Stade Akid Lotfi has hosted four games of the <a href="Algeria%20national%20football%20team">Algeria national football team</a>, against <a href="Qatar">Qatar</a> in 1989, <a href="Burundi">Burundi</a> in 1992, <a href="Ghana">Ghana</a> in 1993, and the <a href="Ivory%20Coast">Ivory Coast</a> in 1993.
